mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM T_PRIVILEGE a
ORDER BY a.id
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM T_PRIVILEGE a WHERE a.parent_ids LIKE '%'+#{parentIds}+'%' ORDER BY a.id

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM T_PRIVILEGE a LEFT JOIN T_PRIVILEGE p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN T_ROLE_PRIVILEGES rp ON rp.privilege_id = a.id JOIN T_ROLE r ON r.id = rp.role_id JOIN T_USER_ROLES ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN T_USER u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.id

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM T_PRIVILEGE a LEFT JOIN T_PRIVILEGE p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN T_ROLE_PRIVILEGES rp ON rp.privilege_id = a.id JOIN T_ROLE r ON r.id = rp.role_id AND r.id = #{roleId} ORDER BY a.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRIVILEGE( parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, icon, permission, notes ) VALUES ( #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{icon}, #{permission}, #{notes} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PRIVILEGE SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, icon = #{icon}, permission = #{permission}, notes = #{notes} WHERE id = #{id}
